Reviews.Title: Great product by the good price
Reviews.Author: josell63 "JoeBArg"
Reviews.Content: I have had other notebooks Envy HP. In this model I like the thin design. The lifelong problem is that led lights white are to the side. The price was accessible according to my basic configuration. It is possible to recommend the equipment for home use. The sound is nothing extravagant. Neither himself because there is a port USB that always gets on power delivering current from the battery.Let's bear in mind that they already have discarded the notebooks of 17"and nobody constructs them. Thanks Jose from Argentina--to April 10th, without problems!

Reviews.Title: GREAT LAPTOP
Reviews.Author: alc60
Reviews.Content: It's quick. Has a good processor with good memory. Includes an abundance of features found on more expensive laptops.An excellent value.

ProductInfo.Features:
Genuine Windows 8.1 64-Bit; 4th Generation Intel® Core i7-4700MQ Quad Core Processor 2.4GHz with Turbo Boost Technology up to 3.40GHz
17.3-inch diagonal Full HD BrightView LED-backlit Display (1920x1080) NON-TOUCH; 2GB (2048MB) NVIDIA(R) GeForce GT 740M Dedicated Graphics
1TB 5400RPM Hard drive with HP ProtectSmart; Blu-ray player and SuperMulti DVD burner
Backlit Keyboard, Intel 7260 Dual Band AC WLAN and Bluetooth® 4.0
HDMI, 4 USB 3.0 Ports, Fingerprint Reader, Beats Audio with 4 speakers, 2 Year HP Warranty
ProductInfo.Name: HP ENVY 17 (non-touch) 17t-j100 Quad Edition Notebook PC; Intel Core i7-4700MQ, 17.3" Full HD Anti-Glare Display (1920 x 1080), 1TB Hard Drive, 2GB NVIDIA GT Graphics (8GB RAM)
